resources.string:
Hello, my name is Daniel Acosta. 

I am currently enrolled at North Central College, where I am studying Computer Science. Im am currently 25 years old and I live with my parents in Bartlett. 

I have 2 siblings, one is 27 and the other 30. 

I enjoy making music in my free time, I use a DAW called FL Studio to layout my songs. I use a combination of audio samples and synthesizers to create electronic music. I hope to one day create a full album and release it to the public
